Txt_JobChange_Message_Start.Text:
Welcome to Alltrades Abbey, where those in search of a new path in life invariably find that which they seek.<KEY_WAIT>
Do <IfSolo(you,you or any of your acquaintances)> wish for a new vocation?

Txt_JobChange_Message_Reject.Text: So be it. We do not force change upon those who do not wish it.

Txt_JobChange_Message_CharaSelect.Text: <IfSolo(So you wish,And who is it who wishes)> to undergo the ritual of change?

Txt_JobChange_Message_Error_Death.Text:
Fool! Do you think me capable of performing miracles? {ACTOR} is dead!<KEY_WAIT>
I cannot change the vocation of a corpse!

Txt_JobChange_Message_Error_Hero.Text: Imbecile! You wish to give up the role of hero!? And just who will save us in your place, hm?

Txt_JobChange_Message_Error_LV.Text:
But you have barely taken even the first steps on the path of the {WORD}, {ACTOR}...<KEY_WAIT>
What manner of frivolous flibbertigibbet gives up before they have even begun? Hmph!

Txt_JobChange_Message_JobSelect.Text: Very well. And what new path will you follow, {ACTOR}?

Txt_JobChange_Message_JocConfirm.Text: You are sure that you wish to become a {WORD}, {ACTOR}?

Txt_JobChange_Message_JocDuplication.Text:
Hm? But what is this?
You have chosen the path that you already follow, {ACTOR}.

Txt_JobChange_Message_JobChangeConfirm.Text: Do you mean that you are resolved to return to level 1 and begin your career anew?

Txt_JobChange_Message_JobChangeStart.Text:
O Goddess above! Great Shepherdess!
Set your servant, {ACTOR}, on a new path through this vale of tears!

Txt_JobChange_Message_JobChangeFinish.Text:
It is done. Congratulations, {ACTOR}, you are now a {WORD}!<KEY_WAIT>
Your equipment has been changed to that of the path you have chosen.

Txt_JobChange_Message_JobChangeCancel.Text:
You have had a change of heart?
Perhaps it is for the best...

Txt_JobChange_Message_AddJobChangeConfir.Text: If you or any others you know wish to embark on another path, simply say the word.

Txt_JobChange_Message_Finish.Text: Very well. Go forth, and may the Goddess smile upon you, whichever path you choose!

Txt_JobChange_Message_Flavor_00.Text: So, {ACTOR}, you wish to become a {WORD}? Very well. The {WORD2} within you will be pleased.

Txt_JobChange_Message_Flavor_01.Text:
A {WORD}? But {ACTOR}!
It is not a path I would recommend to every {WORD2}. But I suppose the choice is yours...

Txt_JobChange_Message_Flavor_02.Text:
Hm! You? The {WORD}?
A {WORD2}? You will forgive me for laughing...

Txt_JobChange_Message_Flavor_03.Text: Well, well! The {WORD} has finally found <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,their)> true calling! My congratulations, {ACTOR}!

Txt_JobChange_Message_Flavor_04.Text:
Well, well... So {ACTOR} the {WORD} wishes to become a {WORD2}...<KEY_WAIT>
Do you wish to do this solely because it is frowned upon? Well, far be it from me to stop you...

Txt_JobChange_Message_Flavor_05.Text:
Hmm... {ACTOR} the {WORD} wishes to become a {WORD2}...<KEY_WAIT>
Your path will not be an easy one.
But it is not my place to forbid such a change...

Txt_JobChange_Message_Flavor_06.Text:
Ho ho ho ho!<KEY_WAIT>
So the {WORD} is to...blossom into a {WORD2}? Ha ha ha! If you meant to make me laugh, you have succeeded!

Txt_JobChange_Message_Flavor_07.Text: Wonderful! The perfect vocation for any {WORD}! A fine choice, {ACTOR}! A fine choice indeed!

Txt_JobChange_Message_Flavor_08.Text: So {ACTOR} the {WORD} wishes to become a {WORD2}? You have come far, my child.

Txt_JobChange_Message_Use_WORDS_OF_WISDO.Text:
So you wish to become a sage? Then you must first read the <6>Words of Wisdom<9>.
<KEY_WAIT>
However, the book may be read but once, so consider yourself warned, my child!
Do you still wish to proceed?
